subject: suite() method handling
msgSnippet: I noticed something that looks like an inconsistency with the way that the suite() method gets handled.  BaseTestRunner is the thing that looks for the
messageBody:
I noticed something that looks like an inconsistency with the way
that the suite() method gets handled. BaseTestRunner is the thing
that looks for the existence of a suite() method in a test. If you
create a TestSuite and pass a class that has a suite() method, the
suite() method is ignored and all the textXXX() methods are iterated
to generate the suite.

Is this intentional behavior? I would think that TestSuite would be
the thing that looks for a suite() method.

Boris
